successes.title: URBANCE: The Pilot Episode
successes.description: Help us produce a kick-ass PILOT EPISODE and URBANCE complete Transmedia series will follow...

Pledges.description:
[ ROOKIE PACK ] 
Give your screen an Urbance lift with an exclusive wallpaper + backers only Facebook cover.
(+ all previous)

[ SUPPORTER PACK ]
Have your name featured in the supporter section of Urbance's website.
(+ all previous)

[ SAVIOR PACK ] A glow in the dark rubber wristband limited to Urbance saviors only ! Unlock Urbance VIP access to exclusive wonders. Nuff said ! Check update #28 for more details. – THIS IS A STANDALONE REWARD NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OF THE OTHER REWARD PACKS.

[ GAMERZ ADD-ON PACK ] Support HOVER / URBANCE cross-over by pre-ordering the URBANCE add-on (DLC) of the HOVER game. This reward is restricted to backers who already have pledged for HOVER: Revolt of Gamers and only contains the extra game content (not the original game and not the pilot episode). See the [GAMERZ PACK] for the full cross-over package.

[ POSSE PACK ]
Download a free copy of our goal episode(s) in glorious HD!
(+ all previous)
[GAMERZ PACK] Download the video game HOVER: Urbance Edition + a HD copy of our pilot episode (THIS IS A STANDALONE REWARD NOT INCLUDED IN OTHER PACKS - check update #13 for details)
[ T-PACK ] Get an amazing and highly anticipated URBANCE T-SHIRT.

Get the [POSSE PACK] for free (THIS IS A STANDALONE KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE REWARD NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OF THE OTHER REWARD TIERS & NOT INCLUDING ANY OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS EXCEPT FOR THE POSSE PACK CONTENT) - add $37 CAD to your existing pledge to receive the [T-PACK].

[ BULLY PACK ] 
Enjoy exclusive artwork with a digital copy of our mini-artbook (25 pages) + Download Urbance OST by PLAID.
(+ all previous)

[ PUNK PACK ]
Receive an Urbance collector stickers pack!
(+ all previous)

[ MATERIAL PACK ]
Own a copy of our goal episode(s) as a DVD/Blu-Ray digipack.
(+ all previous)

[ ENTOURAGE PACK ]
Receive one of the 300 limited signed editions (silver cover) of the Artbook: GENESIS OF URBANCE (168 pages for the hardcore fans).
(+ all previous)
[ REGULAR PACK ] Receive one of the 1500 regular editions of the Artbook: GENESIS OF URBANCE (168 pages for the fans). (+ fees) (+ all previous)

[ VANDAL PACK ]
Embed your name, company or Twitter account as a grafitti in the serie + get the proof as an animated .gif & personalized Facebook cover.
(+ all previous)

[DIGITAL PACK] - DIGITAL REWARDS ONLY: Embed your name, company or Twitter account  as a grafitti in the serie + get the proof as an animated .gif & personalized  Facebook cover + Download a free copy of our goal episode(s) in glorious HD! + Download Urbance OST by Plaid + Enjoy exclusive artwork with a digital copy of our mini-artbook (25 pages) + Have your name featured in the Supporter section of the official Urbance's website!

[DIGITAL PACK REDUX] - DIGITAL REWARDS ONLY: Embed your name, company or Twitter account as a grafitti in the serie + get the proof as an animated .gif & personalized Facebook cover + Download a free copy of our goal episode(s) in glorious HD! + Download Urbance OST by Plaid + Enjoy exclusive artwork with a digital copy of our mini-artbook (25 pages) + Download the game HOVER: URBANCE EDITION + Have your name featured in the Supporter section of the official Urbance's website!

[ MEDIATOR PACK ]
Boast in flashy colors with an original Urbance print by 123Klan (signed and numbered by Joël Dos Reis Viegas).
(+ all previous)
[ VINYL PACK ] Get a collector 12" figure of a Mediator (glowing in the dark!) made in vinyl by a leading art toys manufacturer.
Get the [DIGITAL PACK REDUX] for free

(THIS IS A STANDALONE KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE REWARD NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OF THE OTHER REWARD TIERS & NOT INCLUDING ANY OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS EXCEPT FOR THE DIGITAL PACK REDUX CONTENT) - add $200 CAD to your existing pledge to receive the [VINYL PACK].

[ AMY PACK ]
Be one of the 100 ultimate collectors to receive the exclusive Urbance Dojinshi signed by Hiroshi Shimizu & Joël Dos Reis Viegas.
(+ all previous)

[ LESYA PACK ]
Wanna hang out with Kenzell? Send your picture and receive a graphic urbanized version of yourself + your personal profile picture as an Urbancer for a guaranteed swag effect.
(+ all previous)

[ KENZELL PACK ]
Your name, company logo or Twitter account becomes a graphical element of the serie (tatoo, poster, Tshirt design...) + get the proof as an animated .gif & personalized Facebook cover.
(+ all previous)

[ NEO BLASTERZ PACK ]
One (out of five) original keyframe drawing signed by Hiroshi Shimizu + Urbancer mention as a special thanks in the closing credit of the pilot episode.
(+ all previous)
